org.accada.ale.server.readers
Class PhysicalSourceStub

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.ale.server.readers.PhysicalSourceStub

public class PhysicalSourceStub
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a physical source. It saves the state of the corresponding physical source.

Author:
regli
